title: DACOS VIN Decoding Rules – Expanded Coverage for CAN Bus Data Manufacturers
description: Added 12 major manufacturers from DACOS CAN bus data list: Ford, Porsche, Hyundai, Kia, Mazda, Subaru, Nissan, Lexus, Tesla, Ferrari, McLaren, Lamborghini. Enhanced ZA market coverage.

philosophy.core_principle: VIN is a compressed foreign key into multiple uncontrolled databases – NOT a self-describing schema.
philosophy.repeated_question: Do I know this, or am I inferring it?
philosophy.engine_truth: There is no mathematical way to derive engine capacity from a VIN. Only manufacturer symbol tables, market-specific mappings, historical production patterns.
philosophy.verification_rule: engine.displacement.status = 'verified' only after at least two independent confirmations (ECU + market/commercial)
philosophy.epistemology_first: Never return naked values — always return source, confidence, state (verified/confirmed/inferred/conflicted/unknown), and audit trail.

layer_0.name: Sanity & Physics
layer_0.description: Binary truth. Length=17, charset (no I,O,Q), Mod-11 check digit (ISO 3779). Fails → stop.

layer_2.name: OEM Grammar Decoder (VDS)
layer_2.description: Digits 4-8: manufacturer-defined grammar – declarative rules with confidence

layer_3.name: Market Context Resolver
layer_3.description: Critical for ZA local variations. Inputs: VIN + market hint + WMI + plant

vds_rules.description: BMW X3 G01 - Rosslyn assembly (ZA market)
vds_rules.notes: Prefer when WMI=AAU and market=ZA; plant code often N
Common in Discovery Sport, Range Rover Evoque
Specific SA Market Pattern from DACOSEliteVINDecoder
Unique diesel configs common in ZA builds
Local spec often different from Thai builds
Battery chemistry varies by region and model year
Common in EU/ZA; no detailed descriptors

notes: Version v0.0.4: Added 12 major manufacturers from DACOS CAN bus data list
ZA-specific profiles (AAU, AAV, ADM, AHT, AFA) remain for local assembly differences
Added South African plant codes for Ford (R), Nissan (7), and enhanced existing mappings
Performance brands (Ferrari, McLaren, Lamborghini) include engine family patterns with PR_CODE priority
EV manufacturer Tesla includes battery type hints and model identification patterns
All new manufacturers respect the epistemology-first principle with appropriate confidence scores
Expanded market coverage for US, EU, ZA, and regional markets (KR, JP, AU) where applicable
Engine displacement values should always be treated as high-confidence only when multiple sources agree
